attributes.action: ensure that the tax payer does not pick up the bill for the Cambridgeshire Guided Bus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Guided Bus or misguided bus as it is locally called which has and will cost millions to get it to fruition and is deemed to be of no real use to anyone has now run into financial difficulties.
  I would like to ensure that we the tax payers will NOT end up footing the bill for this debacle.
